name: We Were Toymakers
description:
Toy making is dangerous business! As your great great great grandfather used to say, "Work hard to leave something behind for the next toymaker, maybe they'll be better off than you were." It is this simple principle your family's legacy of toymakers has been founded. If you were to meet a certain death, maybe the next little toymaker will be better equipped to face the perils of unregulated factory work!


Earn cash by bringing a toy from Assembly, to Paint, all the way to Packaging. 

Maintain all aspects of the factory to survive the shift and earn as much money as possible!

If a mistake occurs, use your inheritance to purchase equipment that may make your job easier and possibly safer. 

Controls:

Use Arrow/WASD Keys to move around.

Press Space to Jump.

Press E to Pick Up Items. Press Q to Release Item or Hold Q to Throw Items.

Making a Toy:

Bring Box of Toy Parts off the Conveyor Belt  to the Assembly Station. Once the machine finishes assembling the toy, you may take it to the Painting Station. 

Drop Unpainted Toy off at the Painting Station. Once the Toy is painted bring it to the Packaging Station.

Once the toy is Packaged it may be shipped out at the designated Shipping Area to earn a small commission.
